Card for Christmas 1990 File:Kay Woollard - "We'll be home 'afore it snows again".jpg|"We'll be home 'afore it snows again" ==''[[Weathertop (journal)|Weathertop]]'' covers== All five covers had the same frame designed by Kay Woollard, but the illustrator for the inside piece varied. Kay also supplied the central piece twice. File:Weathertop 1 cover.jpg|[[Weathertop 1|''Weathertop'' 1]] File:Weathertop 5 cover.jpg|[[Weathertop 5|''Weathertop'' 5]] ==''Scenes of the Shire''== The first six were commissioned and published as a set of greeting cards for the [[Tolkien Society]]. === === File:Kay Woollard - TS Greeting Card - Springtime in the Shire.jpg|Springtime in [[the Shire]] File:Kay Woollard - TS Greeting Card - Little Milkmaid in the Yale.jpg|Little Milkmaid in [[the Yale]] File:Kay Woollard - TS Greeting Card - The Shirrif or Caught in the Act.jpg|The [[Shirriff]], or Caught in the Act File:Kay Woollard - TS Greeting Card - Pipe-weed.jpg|[[Pipe-weed]] File:Kay Woollard - TS Greeting Card - The Revellers' Return.jpg|The Revellers' Return File:Kay Woollard - TS Greeting Card - Mushroom Pickers in the Marish.jpg|Mushroom Pickers in the [[Marish]] File:Kay Woollard - Mushroom Pickers in the Marish, version 2 (retouched unfinished design).jpg|Mushroom Pickers in the [[Marish]], version 2 (retouched unfinished design) File:Kay Woollard - The Landlord of the Ivy Bush (retouched unfinished design).jpg|The Landlord of the [[Ivy Bush]] (retouched unfinished design) File:Kay Woollard - A Cornfield in the Shire (retouched unfinished design).jpg|A Cornfield in the [[Shire]] (retouched unfinished design) File:Kay Woollard - Grape Harvest in South Farthing (sketch).jpg|Grape Harvest in [[Southfarthing]] (sketch) ==''Pages from Hob Painter's Sketchbook''== ''Hob Painter'' was an autobiographical character invented by Kay Woollard. He was an independent draughtshob who mainly (barely) earned his living by painting inn signs, but his favourite subjects were portraits and landscapes. File:Kay Woollard - Noggin, the Pot Boy.jpg|1. Noggin, the sandy-haired pot boy at "The Mushroom" File:Kay Woollard - Landlord of The Mushroom.jpg|2. Landlord of "The Mushroom" at Muttering Overgate File:Kay Woollard - Rosie, Cook at The Mushroom.jpg|3. Rosie from "The Mushroom", Muttering Overgate, [[Southfarthing|South Farthing]] File:Kay Woollard - At the Buckland Ferry - The Pretty Girl with the Strange Parcel.jpg|4. Waiting for the [[Buckland]] Ferry. The pretty girl with the strange bundle... File:Kay Woollard - At the Buckland Ferry - Two Lads and their Dad.jpg|5. Waiting for the Buckland Ferry. The two little lads and their dad... File:Kay Woollard - At the Buckland Ferry - The Three Gammers.jpg|6. At the Buckland Ferry. The Three Gammers File:Kay Woollard - At the Buckland Ferry - The Sad Lad.jpg|7. At the Buckland Ferry. File:Kay Woollard - At the Buckland Ferry - The Young Stoor.jpg|11. The young [[Stoors|Stoor]] File:Kay Woollard - At the Buckland Ferry - The Farmer's Pretty Wife and Their Children.jpg|12. Smial near a waterfall - [[North Farthing]] ==''A Sunny Summer Afternoon in the Shire''== This set is also from one of ''Hob Painter'''s notebooks. He drew these in pencil first and finished them later. He owed his burst of inspiration to a very fine pen he had recently acquired which he wanted to try out. His favourite drawing in the set was ''Old Pump on Mushroom Lane''. File:Kay Woollard - The Strange Story Tree.jpg|1. The Strange Story Tree File:Kay Woollard - Strawberry Tarts on Pewter Dish.jpg|2. Strawberry Tarts on Pewter Dish File:Kay Woollard - A Bachelor Smial.jpg|3. A Bachelor Smial File:Kay Woollard - A Very Necessary Place.jpg|4. The Water Jug File:Kay Woollard - Rhubarb Pie.jpg|17. Rhubarb Pie ==''Landscapes and Settings of the Shire''== The eye of the observer is invited to wander, as each of the paintings tells a story. File:Kay Woollard - A Cottage in the Marish - East Farthing.jpg|A cottage in the [[Marish]] - [[Eastfarthing|East Farthing]] File:Kay Woollard - The Pedlar of Medicines.jpg|The pedlar of medicines - Cottages and cottagers near [[Hardbottle]] File:Kay Woollard - An Almost Concealed Smial - West Farthing.jpg|An almost concealed Smial - [[Westfarthing|West Farthing]] File:Kay Woollard - Dinner Time - A farmhouse kitchen.jpg|Dinner time - A farmhouse kitchen in the Shire File:Kay Woollard - Valerie Sutton's It Always Rains on Washing Day.jpg|It always rains on washing day - Smial in [[Southfarthing|South Farthing]] File:Kay Woollard - The Causeway, looking South - Rushey in the distance.jpg|The [[Causeway]], looking South - [[Rushey]] in the Distance: A Blustery Day in Early Autumn ==Various [[Hobbits]]== File:Kay Woollard - Lobelia.jpg|[[Lobelia]] File:Kay Woollard - Pippin.jpg|[[Pippin]] File:Kay Woollard - Dora Baggins.jpg|[[Dora Baggins]] File:Kay Woollard - Belladonna running after Isengar in the Old Forest.jpg|[[Belladonna Took|Belladonna]] running after [[Isengar]] in the [[Old Forest]] File:Kay Woollard - The Latter Days of Gerontius Took.jpg|The Latter Days of [[Gerontius Took]] File:Kay Woollard - Two Gaffers and a Gammer.jpg|Two Gaffers and a Gammer File:Kay Woollard - Edwy, the hero of The Survivor.jpg|Alfric, the hero of ''The Survivor'' ([[Mallorn 25|''Mallorn'' 25]]) File:Kay Woollard - A Slumbering Pedlar.jpg|A Slumbering Pedlar File:Kay Woollard - Rosie Cotton.jpg|[[Rosie Cotton]] (2) File:Kay Woollard - Children of the Hobbits.jpg|Children of the Hobbits ==Various [[Dwarves]]== The first seven pieces displayed here belonged to ''Peter Bolton'' (deceased). Each individual piece is also reproduced separately. A memorial note on Peter is appended to his collection. This section of the gallery is dedicated to him.
